name: The Turing Machine
description:
The Turing Machine is a simple yet extremely challenging logic puzzle where you turn and connect all the wheels to solve a level.

Beware it might seem simple at first glance, but it is one of the hardest puzzles ever made. Maybe. Probably.

How to play:

Simply click to turn the wheels in the correct position. However, each wheel will also turn the neighbouring wheels.

Features:

  • ⭕️ Minimalistic
  • 🖱 Simple controls
  • ☯ Zen Gameplay
  • 🎵 Meditative Soundtrack by Simon Slator
